content: Hi, I am trying to measure the size impact of implicit caller location (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/70579) on an embedded project to add some data to that issue. I am able to successfully build a compiler locally, but can't build the project using it, because our project relies on rust-lld (installed via rustup component add llvm-tools-preview). Is there a way to make that component available on a custom toolchain?
Thanks. Sorry if that is documented somewhere obvious and I missed it
